item.description:
Angelic Support Circle
Helene Olsen, Psychic Medium

Sundays 7:00 - 8:30 p.m.
March 6, 13, 20, 27   $60 (covers all four meetings)

If you are already in communication with Divine Realms, then this is the place for you! Receiving guidance and information from Angels is a special gift that we are homing. There is strength in numbers when we collect and hear messages and receive Light and Love as a group. I'm being told that there is still important work to be done. Join this group to network and strengthen your abilities. Let's get together and hear what Divine beings of Light want us to know!

These classes are limited to 8 people and are being advertised in several places. Please register as soon as possible by sending email to Helene directly at Helene@AngelsLighthouse.com. Full payment is requested before the class starts. "Really wonderful and amazing and the angels really do come and they really do speak!" -Judy

Learn more about Helene at www.angelslighthouse.com
item.why: Access divine energy. messages and guidance from the angelic realm as we sit in a circle and open to the angels with Helene's way of bringing in the divine beings.
item.name: Angel Support Circle with Helene Olsen
